content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting System at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Stone furnace at (-17.0, -51.0)
Currently working but furnace has no fuel and is full of iron plates (19)

### Copper Mining and Smelting System at (-21.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-21.0, -73.0)
- Stone furnace at (-20.0, -71.0)
Currently waiting for output space, furnace contains copper plates (14)

### Power Generation System at (-14.5, 19.0)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at (-14.5, 19.0)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, 19.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting components
System is partially working:
- Offshore pump is working and outputting water
- Boiler and steam engine are not properly connected yet
- Complex pipe network present but most pipe groups are empty

### Research Lab System
Consists of:
- Lab with automation science packs (10)
Currently not operational due to no power

### Unused Smelting Area
Group of 4 unused furnaces at:
- (0.0, 0.0)
- (2.0, 0.0)
- (2.0, 4.0)
- (4.0, 4.0)
All have fuel (23 coal each) but no ingredients

### Electricity Distribution Network
Electric pole network (Group ID 1656) connecting various areas but currently not operational (0 voltage)

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Connection Issues
- Ensure proper fluid connections between offshore pump, boiler and steam engine
- Verify pipe connections are continuous and not blocked
- Check that connection points between components are properly aligned

### Production Line Blockages
- Mining drills are getting blocked due to full output furnaces
- Implement a system to regularly clear furnace outputs to prevent production stoppage

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Attempting to extract iron ore from copper furnaces - verify correct furnace identification before extraction
- Ensure proper resource type matching when extracting from furnaces

### Power Distribution
- Lab and other electrical components have no power
- Ensure power generation system is properly connected and operational before expanding electrical network

### Fuel Management
- Some furnaces are running out of fuel while others have excess
- Implement better fuel distribution system across all fuel-consuming entities
